org.tap4j.producer

Interface Producer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TapProducer

    public interface Producer
    Produces a TAP Stream.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      String dump(TestSet testSet)
      Returns a String representing the TAP Stream produced from a TestSet.

      Writes the TAP Stream into an output File.

      Returns the Representer used in the Producer.

      • dump

        void dump(TestSet testSet,
        File output)
        Writes the TAP Stream into an output File. This will choose an encoding for the output written to the file, using the following rules. If this Producer's Representer is a Tap13Representer, the chosen encoding will be taken from its Charset option. In any other case, the chosen encoding will be the system's default encoding. If that is not the correct encoding for the file, the caller should wrap the file in a Writer for the correct encoding, and pass that to dump(TestSet,Writer).
        Parameters:
        testSet - TestSet
        output - Output File
        Throws:
        ProducerException

      • getRepresenter

        Representer getRepresenter()
        Returns the Representer used in the Producer.
        Returns:
        Representer
